description: Controls web replay, and manages recording sessions and segments.

types.description: State machine's state for the session.
State machine's state for the session segment.

properties.name: segmentOffset
properties.description: Offset for a segment within the currently-loaded replay session.

properties.name: inputOffset
properties.description: Offset for an event loop input within the specified session segment.

properties.name: offset
properties.description: Offset of this input in its respective queue.

types.description: A standalone segment of a replay session that corresponds to a single main frame navigation and execution.

properties.name: timestamp
properties.description: Start time of the segment, in milliseconds since the epoch.

types.description: An ordered collection of replay session segments.

properties.name: timestamp
properties.description: Creation time of session, in milliseconds since the epoch.

properties.name: segments
properties.description: An ordered list identifiers for the segments that comprise this replay session.

commands.name: startCapturing
commands.description: Starts capture of a new replay session.

commands.name: stopCapturing
commands.description: Stops capture of the currently recording replay session.

commands.name: replayToPosition
commands.description: Seek execution to a specific position within the replay session.

commands.name: pausePlayback
commands.description: Pauses playback in the current segment. Can be resumed by using a replay command.

commands.name: cancelPlayback
commands.description: Cancels playback of the current segment. Further replaying will start from the beginning of the current segment.

commands.name: switchSession
commands.description: Unloads the current replay session and loads the specified session

commands.name: insertSessionSegment
commands.description: Splices the specified session segment into the session at the specified index.

commands.name: removeSessionSegment
commands.description: Removes the session segment at the specified position from the session.

commands.name: currentReplayState
commands.description: Returns the identifier, position, session state and segment state of the currently loaded session. This is necessary because the inspector may be closed and reopened in the middle of replay.

returns.name: segmentIdentifier
returns.description: If no segment is currently loaded, then there is no valid segment identifier.

commands.name: getAvailableSessions
commands.description: Returns identifiers of all available sessions.

commands.name: getSessionData
commands.description: Returns an object for the specified session.

commands.name: getSegmentData
commands.description: Returns an object for the specified session segment.

events.name: playbackHitPosition
events.description: Playback within the session has progressed up to this position, and is about to replay the input at the specified offset.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The playback position that was hit.

events.name: playbackStarted
events.description: Fired when session playback has started.

events.name: playbackPaused
events.description: Fired when session playback has paused, but not finished.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The playback position immediately prior to where playback is paused.

events.name: playbackFinished
events.description: Fired when session playback has stopped.

events.name: inputSuppressionChanged
events.description: Fired when the replay controller starts or stops suppressing user inputs.

parameters.name: willSuppress
parameters.description: Whether user inputs will be suppressed during playback.

events.name: sessionCreated
events.description: Fired when a new replay session is created

events.name: sessionModified
events.description: Fired when a session's segments have changed.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier for the session the segment was added to.

events.name: sessionRemoved
events.description: Fired when a replay session is removed and can no longer be loaded.

events.name: sessionLoaded
events.description: Fired when a replay session is loaded.

events.name: segmentCreated
events.description: Fired when a new session segment is created.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier for the created session segment.

events.name: segmentRemoved
events.description: Fired when a session segment is removed and can no longer be replayed as part of a session.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier for the removed session segment.

events.name: segmentCompleted
events.description: Fired when a session segment is completed and can no longer have inputs added to it.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier for the completed session segment.

events.name: segmentLoaded
events.description: Fired when a segment is loaded.

events.name: segmentUnloaded
events.description: Fired when a segment is unloaded.
